channel.description: Date: 04-01-2024 -> 06-21-2024 Goal: Help my son eat healthier, get more sleep (in his own room), and be able to regulate his emotions better. WHY? Less Chaos. Healthier and Happier Child. Get to enjoy childâ€™s company more. Strategies to help me succeed: Read and implement 3 parenting books. Make smoothies almost daily. Focus on sticking to evening routine. Make time for play every day. Read: Playful Parenting French Kids Eat Everything The Gardener and the Carpenter
